6.name: the giant rat
6.lookDescription: The rat watches you with its dark beady eyes

64.name: the black panther
64.lookDescription: crouches before you, ready to pounce

65.name: the monkey
65.inDescription: drops down out of a tree
65.lookDescription: peers at you from behind a treetrunk

81.name: the weasel
conv: Pops up its head and looks around
Eyes you suspiciously as if you are up to no good
Scurries arround in a series of little springy jumps

112.name: Erik
112.lookDescription: snarls at you, having been woken from his hangover.

118.lookDescription: Njalmir kneels before the bonfire rubbing their hands.
118.name: njalmir
conv: # njalmir ladels out a bowl of soup from the cauldron

137.name: the fire demon
conv: Foolish mortal!|# The demon's laughter echoes through the cavern

139.name: the fur trapper
conv: I'm only a fake fur trapper|Fur as in furry|What?
Yes, I agree|Er...yes|Heck yeah|I hadn't thought of that|You may be right
My traps are never very successful|I keep trying to trap things and they keep getting away|I make the world's least successful traps
That's a great question|What indeed|I don't know|No idea
I seem to be standing next to a pile of rubble, but have no idea how this happened|Rubble, you say?|Rubble trouble|Well, this is a fine mess

165.lookDescription: Wearing rough clothes and a hood the beggar rests uneasily against a wall|The beggar is a gaunt hooded figure in rough clothing|A shabby looking fellow wearing rough clothing. His face is obscured by a hood
165.name: the beggar
conv: Consideration for a poor man|Have pity upon a humble wretch|Mercy on a poor man. He slowly stretches out his hand towards you
I'm not inclined to assist one such as yourself
I have no advice for you
I don't know anything about that

166.name: the black raven
conv: locates a vantage point with a clear line of sight|finds a perch from which to view the area|uses its accute sense of sight|swivels its head a few times to scan the enivonment
166.inDescription: hops in|swoops in|flies in and perches
166.outDescription: flies off|takes to the air and is gone|flutters off
166.lookDescription: The raven watches you through one beady eye|The raven watches you curiously

215.name: the imp
conv: The imp notices a few things
215.inDescription: walks in, cleaning and polishing|trundles in|arrives|wanders in
215.lookDescription: The imp hums and fusses about the state of this place|The imp stands grinning at you cheekily|The imp is doing some kind of impish dance|The imp hovers and observes anyone passing by

303.name: the one-armed zombie
303.lookDescription: A shambolic figure with a single arm. It gazes mindlessly at you.

336.lookDescription: The crawler zombie looks vaguely like it was previously some kind of human, but it has no legs and its upper body is extensively decayed. It pulls its tattered torso around with its arms in a grotesque manner.
336.name: the crawler zombie

337.lookDescription: The grey zombie is thin, with ragged scraps of dusty clothing draping from it. turns slowly to follow you.
337.name: the grey zombie

339.name: the pruple zombie
339.lookDescription: Putrid smoke rises from the chest of the purple zombie. Its face seems almost entirely decayed with unrecognizable features.

340.name: the green zombie
340.lookDescription: A lurid shade of green, the zombie barely manages to stand and its dark eye sockets stare vacantly in your direction.

380.name: the knight
380.inDescription: arrives with a clanking of armor

392.name: a cute little bunny rabbit
conv: # Pricks up its ears|# Remains motionless|# Hops away from you

393.name: a cute little bunny rabbit
conv: # Pricks up its ears|# Remains motionless|# Hops away from you

394.name: a cute little bunny rabbit
conv: # Pricks up its ears|# Remains motionless|# Hops away from you
394.lookDescription: frolicks in the grass|The bunny hops and nibbles

405.name: the old inn-keeper
conv: We don't have any left|None left. We sold out|Out of stock at present
I wish that creatures would tidy up after themselves
The darts club is every wednesday
We don't serve wine in this establishment, only ale|Ale only, I'm afraid|It's ale or nothing
This weapon may come in handy on your adventures
I might get around to playing it, but I'm too busy|I've vaguely heard of it|Don't do much gaming myself. Too busy|I don't have time for games|Isn't that some ancient thing nobody plays anymore?
405.lookDescription: stands behind the bar, pulling ugly faces

1107.name: anarchy the wizard
conv: I used to rule this universe, but after I retired it all went to rack and ruin. Not my fault!|Once I ruled this universe, but after a while I decided it just wasn't worth it. Now under new management things are getting shabby|When I ruled this universe things were kept in good order|Any universe is only as good as its management, and now I'm retired you can see the results for yourself

Anarchy by name. Anarchy by nature|Anarchy is the force which animates our universe|I am Anarchy|Anarchy is the spirit of all true adventurers|Anarchy is the force eternally at work in our world|Without anarchy there is no true order
It's a fine place|It's a great town
Never heard of it|Aber-what?|I don't think I've heard of that

Birfle likes to think of themselves as an enrepreneur. A 'self-made man'. Scam artist, more like|Don't buy anything from Birfle. Whatever he's selling will be fake|Apparently Birfle had some sort of cryptocurrency scam going. When it all went south he did a runner. Nobody has seen him since|People like Birfle were part of the decline of this city. Hucksters with fancy schemes stealing people's money
The island was where Birfle created his libertarian paradise. But it didn't work out well|Birfle set up a base on the island and tried to turn it into a tax haven
The vikings are kind of boring, to be honest. Best avoided
The dwarves do a lot of mining. Some say they're building yet another fortress

Tranoch has been economically going downhill for a while. Apparently the investors pulled out after a scandal involving 'toxic assets', but I care little about the financial details|Tranoch isn't not what it used to be. Becoming a ghost town. Nobody invests here now
# Takes a sip of his ale|# Ignores you|# Scratches his beard|# Looks out of the window|# Taps his fingers on the bench
1107.lookDescription: The old wizard is peacefully drinking ale at one of the benches. He wears a long black robe decorated with red crescent moon and runic symbols|Wearning a dark formal robe the old wizard sits drinking ale at one of the benches

524.name: the giant snake
524.lookDescription: The giant snake looks like an anaconda. Its forked tongue flicking in and out. Its reptillian eyes observe you suspiciously.

536.lookDescription: The giant rat squeaks and shows its teeth|Hunched in the corner is a giant and vicious-looking rat|The giant rat screeches loudly|The giant rat glares at you
536.name: the giant rat
conv: Eeeeeek!|# Twitches its whiskers|# Looks at you suspiciously|# Lets forth a bloodcurdling shriek|# Cleans its whiskers|# Glares at you

646.name: the wizened man
conv: # In an unsteady voice he says "So many to remember, and so much of it is sad. Alas even I can remember them all no longer."
646.lookDescription: He looks very sad indeed.. loaded with the cares and memories of a world filled with pain|The wizened old man stands quietly in the shadows, pain filled eyes gazing out across the world. As you walk past he turns and looks forlornly at you

678.name: the librarian
conv: I don't think we have that title|Those are popular. I thing they've all been lent
Have you noticed the clacks overhead. They point upwards.
We are not lending at this time|# Looks annoyed. "We are not lending at this time"|# Looks irritated. "We are not lending at this time"
There are many to choose from
We have new scrolls and old scrolls
Good literature is the best intoxicant
678.lookDescription: stands here, keeping you away from their precious books

723.name: the elf
723.lookDescription: The elf watches you suspiciously|The elf frowns at you|The elf appears generally displeased at your presence

809.name: the dark priest
conv: # Remains silent|# Does not respond|# Nods

811.name: the monk
conv: # Remains silent|# Continues praying|# Does not respond|# Moves slightly but continues to pray|# Nods
811.lookDescription: The monk stands devout in prayer

812.name: the old monk
conv: # Remains silent|# Continues meditating|# Does not respond|# Rocks slowly as they meditate|# Looks serene

840.name: the hermit
840.lookDescription: stands hunched, smiling as he watches the world pass him slowly by

861.name: the sturdy dwarf
conv: To be sure|Agreed|Oh indeed|Well, of course|Yes

867.name: the ogre
conv: # Looks angry|# Roars, and the walls vibrate
867.inDescription: stomps in looking for heads to break
867.lookDescription: stands here looking for heads to break

877.inDescription: pads up towards you, sniffing the air
877.lookDescription: watches you cautiously from a distance
877.name: the bear

945.lookDescription: The brown goat is cropping grass peacefully|Is sitting and chewing grass
945.name: the brown goat

946.inDescription: wanders in, cropping grass as it goes
946.lookDescription: The black goat is chewing the cud quietly
946.name: the black goat

954.name: the strong dwarf
conv: Are you sure?|# Looks skeptical|# Shakes their head

1104.lookDescription: crouches before you, eyeing you suspiciously
1104.name: the wolf

1373.name: the stone golem
1373.outDescription: turns and strides off to the

1374.name: rider on horseback
1374.lookDescription: The rider on a dappled brown horse looks like the inn-keeper's son and is giving people rides between the high street and the inn. Perhaps this free transportation is useful for removing troublemakers.
conv: You climb into position behind The rider and they take you to the high street
You climb into position behind The rider and they take you to the hatchet inn

1104.inDescription: wanders in|slinks in|casually walks in and sits
1104.lookDescription: The cat watches you with half open eyes|The cat glances at you, then looks away again|The cat is sitting with its paws tucked under its body
1104.name: the black cat
conv: Finds a dark corner and disappears into it
Watches you curiously|Purrs|Yawns|Sits with their feet tucked under
Sits with their paws outstretched|Twitches their ears back
Sits and licks one of their paws|Twitches their whiskers
Sniffs at an object|Pricks up their ears

1105.name: the chicken
conv: The chicken pauses to look at you for a moment, then continues pecking the ground.
1105.outDescription: wanders out|ruffles its feathers and trots off|flutters off
1105.lookDescription: The chicken continues pecking, disregarding you entirely|The chicken scratches at the ground with its foot|The chicken looks around, as if startled

1106.name: the sheep
1106.lookDescription: The sheep stands around looking bored|The sheep chews and looks blankly at you

1108.name: iwerydd
1108.lookDescription: The ostler drinks ale nearby|The ostler sits at a bench, drinking ale

1109.name: iwerydd
1109.lookDescription: The ostler is busy grooming the horse.

1110.name: leuke
1110.lookDescription: The malemaker sits quietly sipping ale

1111.name: morfyl
1111.lookDescription: The beekeeper is drinking a small cup of mead

1112.name: morfyl the beekeeper
1112.lookDescription: The beekeeper carefully inspects the hive

1112.name: mechyll
1112.lookDescription: The farrier enthusiastically downs another tankard of ale

1113.name: arthwys
1113.lookDescription: The tanner drinks ale from a leather jug

1114.name: bledri
1114.lookDescription: The tanner drinks ale from a leather jug

1115.name: gwir
1115.lookDescription: The costermonger drinks ale from a jar

1116.name: the costermonger
1116.lookDescription: The costermonger is selling vegetables from a small tray slung on a strap around their neck

1117.name: iwerydd
1117.lookDescription: iwerydd sits praying|iwerydd sits in silent contemplation|iwerydd is reading from a small prayer book

1118.name: leuke
1118.lookDescription: leuke sits praying|leuke sits in silent contemplation|leuke is reading from a small prayer book

1119.name: morfyl
1119.lookDescription: morfyl sits praying|morfyl sits in silent contemplation|morfyl is reading from a small prayer book

1120.name: mechyll
1120.lookDescription: mechyll sits praying|mechyll sits in silent contemplation|mechyll is reading from a small prayer book

1121.name: arthwys
1121.lookDescription: arthwys sits praying|arthwys sits in silent contemplation|arthwys is reading from a small prayer book

1122.name: bledri
1122.lookDescription: bledri sits praying|bledri sits in silent contemplation|bledri is reading from a small prayer book

1123.name: gwir
1123.lookDescription: gwir sits praying|gwir sits in silent contemplation|gwir is reading from a small prayer book

1124.lookDescription: Wearing a black robe with large overhanging hood the priest stands motionless before the rows of pews
1124.name: the hooded priest
conv: # Remains silent|# Does not respond|# The priest turns slowly to look at you but his face is obscured in shadow. Then he turns away again

1125.name: the goose
conv: The goose glares at you, then continues pecking the ground|The goose flaps its wings|The goose pecks at the ground|The goose looks at you quizzically|The goose honks at an annoyingly loud volume

1126.name: the druid
1126.lookDescription: Dressed in a dark robe with long dishevelled hair, The druid stands with both hands on their staff|The druid is chanting|Dressed in a dark robe with long dishevelled hair, the druid holds their staff aloft with both hands|Dressed in a dark robe with long dishevelled hair, the druid stands in silence

1127.name: the ancester spirit
conv: # The eyes of the ancester spirit fix upon you
1127.lookDescription: The ancester spirit appears as a luminescent figure composed of swirling eddies of white mist. Its only clearly defined features are its eyes, which survey the surroundings with great intensity
